title: `vm.toString(bytes32)` not hex string
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [X] Foundry
- [X] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (16b4ef6 2022-07-13T00:05:41.265337096Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

forge

### Operating System

Linux

### Describe the bug

I would expect that `vm.toString(bytes32)` would serialize the bytes32 as a `0x` prefixed hex string (since that is the norm in ethereum tooling) but it seems like its serializing the bytes themselves. The following stack trace shows the problem in the call to `vm.ffi`
